entities

Class ExerciseContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • entities.ExerciseContext

  • public class ExerciseContext
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds the Context of a Exercise object, created by an ExerciseContextFactory.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected ExerciseContext(java.lang.String exerciseName)
      Creates a ExerciseContext, this is only called by ExerciseContext.
